name: @aloompa/dynamo-graphql-directives
description: ``` aws dynamodb create-table \  --table-name performers \  --attribute-definitions \  AttributeName=id,AttributeType=S \  AttributeName=name,AttributeType=S \  --key-schema AttributeName=id,KeyType=HASH AttributeName=name,KeyType=RANGE \  --provisioned-throughput ReadCapacityUnits=1,WriteCapacityUnits=1 \  --endpoint-url http://localhost:8000
author: Aloompa
